ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule III to the Financial Administration Act (Canada Post Corporation)
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULE III to the FINANCIAL ADMINISTRATION ACT (Canada Post Corporation) to reflect the Government's vision for CANADA POST as a more service-focused organization that is expected to reinvest any profits in the Corporation's products and services.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0187 Publication Date: 2018-10-03
